an3.101:1.9: dhantaṁ sandhantaṁ → adhantaṁ asandhantaṁ (sya-all, km) | niddhantaṁ aniddhantakasāvaṁ → anihitaṁ anikkhittakasāvaṁ (bj); aniddhantaṁ anihitaṁ aninnītakasāvaṁ (sya-all, km, pts1ed)
an3.101:1.11: niddhantaṁ niddhantakasāvaṁ → nihitaṁ nikkhittakasāvaṁ (bj); nihitaṁ ninnītakasāvaṁ (sya-all, km, pts1ed)
an3.101:2.5: sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato → sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritavato (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed); sasaṅkhāraniggayhavārivāvato (mr); sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāriyādhigato (?)
an3.101:2.6: sannisīdati ekodi hoti → ekodibhāvaṁ gacchati (si); ekodibhāvo hoti (sya-all, km, mr)
